full_transcript: Wow, have you seen the impact tests on this stuff? Hexenon-Lite is unbelievable. You can literally throw a drone made of this off a roof and it stays in one piece. For a manufacturer, this means fewer returns and higher customer satisfaction. It's light as a feather but tough as nails. We're talking about a non-toxic material that finally solves the 'fragile drone' problem for hobbyists.

segments.text: Wow, have you seen the impact tests? Hexenon-Lite is unbelievable. You can throw it off a roof.
segments.speaker: Owen Wilson
